00018 // ConnectivityManager mother class definition
00020 
00021 struct ConnectivityManager {
00022     virtual bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn) = 0;
00023 };
00024

00028 // FullConnectivity class definition
00030 
00031 class FullConnectivity
00032         : public ConnectivityManager
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     FullConnectivity(std::ifstream & is) {}
00036     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn) {
00037         return true;
00038     }
00039 };

00044 // RandomFullPreConnectivity class definition
00045 // proba_connection_ chance for each neuron to have connections, if yes full connectivity with all other neurons as preneurons
00047 
00048 class RandomFullPreConnectivity
00049         : public ConnectivityManager
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     RandomFullPreConnectivity(std::ifstream & is, const Size & size_gp_postnrn);
00053     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn);
00054 protected:
00055     std::vector<bool> post_neuron_list_;
00056 };

00064

00078 // FullByBlockConnectivity class definition
00079 // divide preneuron pool (resp. postneuron) in nb_division_pre_ (resp. nb_division_post_) "equal" subpools
00080 // connects the #num_subgp_pre_ subpool of preneurons with #num_subgp_post_ subpool of postneurons
00082 
00083 class FullByBlockConnectivity
00084         : public ConnectivityManager
00085 {
00086 public:
00087     FullByBlockConnectivity(std::ifstream & is, const Size & size_gp_prenrn, const Size & size_gp_postnrn);
00088     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn);
00089 protected:
00090     unsigned num_subgp_pre_, nb_division_pre_, num_subgp_post_, nb_division_post_, size_gp_prenrn_, size_gp_postnrn_;
00091 };
00092 
00093 
00094 
00096 // RandomByBlockConnectivity class definition
00097 // divide preneuron pool (resp. postneuron) in nb_division_pre_ (resp. nb_division_post_) "equal" subpools
00098 // connects the #num_subgp_pre_ subpool of preneurons with #num_subgp_post_ subpool of postneurons with
00099 // proba given by proba_connection
00101 
00102 class RandomByBlockConnectivity
00103         : public ConnectivityManager
00104 {
00105 public:
00106     RandomByBlockConnectivity(std::ifstream & is, const Size & size_gp_prenrn, const Size & size_gp_postnrn);
00107     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn);
00108 protected:
00109     unsigned num_subgp_pre_, nb_division_pre_, num_subgp_post_, nb_division_post_, size_gp_prenrn_, size_gp_postnrn_;
00110     double proba_connection_;
00111 };
00112 
00113 
00114 
00116 // RandomConnectivity class definition
00117 // connection with probability proba_connection_
00119 
00120 class RandomConnectivity
00121         : public ConnectivityManager
00122 {
00123 public:
00124     RandomConnectivity(std::ifstream & is);
00125     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn) {
00126         return (RandomGenerator::dran(1.) < proba_connection_);
00127     }
00128 protected:
00129     double proba_connection_;
00130 };
00131

00143     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn);
00144 protected:
00145     std::vector<std::vector<bool> > con_list_;

00151 // LoopConnectivity class definition
00153 // creates loops by connecting a random neuron to a next one and then until reaching the desired length minus 1
00154 // then connects back to the initial one
00155 // each step a random neuron is drawn, checking it hasn't been picked up previously
00156 
00157 class LoopConnectivity
00158         : public ConnectivityManager
00159 {
00160 public:
00161     LoopConnectivity(std::ifstream & is, const Size & size_gp);
00162     bool do_connect(const Size & n_prenrn, const Size & n_postnrn);
00163 protected:
00164     Size number_of_loops_, length_of_loops_;
00165     std::vector<std::vector<bool> > con_list_;
00166 };

00180 protected:
